snippet: During his winter vacation in Hawaii, President Obama has played golf seven out of his 12 days here, for as much as six hours at a time.
abstract: Extent of Pres Obama's love of golf has been on display during his winter vacation in Hawaii, where he has played seven out of his 12 days there, for as much as six hours at a time; fifteen of the past 18 presidents have played golf, and their approach to the game has often illustrated their character in office.
lead_paragraph: During his winter vacation in Hawaii, President Obama has played golf seven out of his 12 days here, for as much as six hours at a time.

headline.main: Carrying On a Presidential Tradition, One Leisurely Round at a Time
headline.print_headline: Carrying On Presidential Tradition, One Leisurely Round at a Time
